mapper.select: SELECT find.iffpSeq ,find.iffpName ,findup.path ,findup.uuidName FROM findpet find JOIN abandonedUploaded findup ON find.iffpSeq = findup.pseq WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY find.iffpSeq DESC
SELECT find.* ,findup.path ,findup.uuidName FROM findpet find JOIN abandonedUploaded findup ON find.iffpSeq = findup.pseq WHERE find.iffpSeq = #{iffpSeq}

SELECT mm.ifmmID ,mmup.path ,mmup.uuidName ,co.ifcmContent ,co.ifcmRegDate FROM member mm JOIN memberUploaded mmup ON mm.ifmmSeq = mmup.pseq JOIN comment co ON mm.ifmmSeq = co.mm_ifmmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND co.type = 1 AND co.fp_iffpSeq = #{iffpSeq}

SELECT find.* ,findup.path ,findup.uuidName ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment co WHERE find.iffpSeq = co.fp_iffpSeq ) AS commentcount FROM findpet find JOIN abandonedUploaded findup ON find.iffpSeq = findup.pseq WHERE 1=1 AND find.iffpSeq = #{iffpSeq}
SELECT mm.ifmmID AS writer ,mmup.path ,mmup.uuidName FROM member mm JOIN memberUploaded mmup ON mm.ifmmSeq = mmup.pseq WHERE 1=1 AND mm.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
